name: ExportOptionsSVG
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when exporting a document as an SVG file.

property.name: DTD
property.shortdesc: The version of DTD that the exported file should be conforming to.

property.name: fontType
property.shortdesc: The type of font that should be included in the exported file.

property.name: fontSubsetting
property.shortdesc: What font glyphs should be included in the exported file.

property.name: embedRasterImages
property.shortdesc: Should the raster images in the exported file be included.

property.name: coordinatePrecision
property.shortdesc: Decimal precision for element coordinate values.

property.name: documentEncoding
property.shortdesc: How should the text in the document be encoded.

property.name: cssProperties
property.shortdesc: How should the CSS properties of the document be included in the document.

property.name: compressed
property.shortdesc: Should the exported file be compressed.

property.name: slices
property.shortdesc: Preserve slice data in exported document.

property.name: preserveEditability
property.shortdesc: Preserve Illustrator editing capabilities when exporting the document.

property.name: saveMultipleArtboards
property.shortdesc: All the artboards or range of the artboards will be saved.

property.name: artboardRange
property.shortdesc: If SaveMultipleArtboards is true,this will be considered for multi-asset extraction which specifies artboard range.Empty string will extracts all the artboards.Default is empty string.
